item.title: Toptic Variable
item.description: $_ 变量 $_ 是主题变量。它是没有显式签名的块的默认参数，因此 for @array {...} 和 given $var {...} 这样的构造通过调用块绑定到 $_。 for for <a b c> { say $_ } # sets $_ to 'a', 'b' and 'c' in turn say $_ for <a b c>; # same, even though it's not a block given given 'a' { say $_ } # sets $_ to 'a' say $_ given 'a'; # same, even though it's not a block 设置默认的主题变量可以省去很多打字：
